title: The Essential Question

panel_structure.description: Multiple mirrors showing Evan's surface identities—social roles, names, relationships—all labeled 'WHO', reflecting familiar but ultimately superficial answers
Behind the mirrors, a vast void containing swirling patterns of consciousness, labeled 'WHAT?'—the essential mystery that no identity can capture

transformation_notes: The question becomes visual philosophy—mirrors reflecting all we think we know about ourselves (who) while revealing the deeper mystery of what we fundamentally are remains unanswered.
